user.title: Ryde Waste Collection
user.description:
Enter your address in the Ryde LGA to track waste collection schedules.

Format: '129 Blaxland Road Ryde 2112' (do not include NSW)

Note: This is an unofficial integration created by Andrew Riley and is not affiliated with Ryde Council.

error.address_not_found: Address not found in Ryde Council's system. Please check the address and try again.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Ryde Council API. Please try again later.

init.title: Ryde Waste Collection Options
init.description: Configure update interval for waste collection data.
